an5.150:1.1: “Mendicants, these five things lead to the decline of a mendicant who is temporarily free.
an5.150:1.3: They relish work, talk, and sleep. They don’t guard the sense doors and they eat too much.
an5.150:1.4: These five things lead to the decline of a mendicant who is temporarily free.
an5.150:2.1: These five things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant who is temporarily free.
an5.150:2.3: They don’t relish work, talk, sleep, and company. They guard the sense doors and they have moderation in eating.
an5.150:2.4: These five things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant who is temporarily free.”
